languages.text: "Мои братья". {n}Ульфар склоняется над телами, закованными в керамит и адамантиум. Рыжие брови страдальчески изломились.{/n} "Вновь судьба не дала мне отправиться в чертог Всеотца с моими братьями".

"My brothers." {n}Red brows furrowed in anguish, Ulfar bows down over the bodies encased in ceramite and adamantine.{/n} "Once again, fate has barred me from travelling to the hall of the Allfather with my brothers."
languages.original_text: "Мои братья". {n}Ульфар склоняется над телами, закованными в керамит и адамантиум. Рыжие брови страдальчески изломились.{/n} "Вновь судьба не дала мне отправиться в чертог Всеотца с моими братьями".

traits.locale_text: "My brothers." {n}Red brows furrowed in anguish, Ulfar bows down over the bodies encased in ceramite and adamantium.{/n} "Once again, fate has barred me from travelling to the hall of the Allfather with my brothers."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "My brothers." {n}Red brows furrowed in anguish, Ulfar bows down over the bodies encased in ceramite and adamantium.{/n} "Once again, fate has barred me from travelling to the hall of the Allfather with my brothers."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "My brothers." {n}Red brows furrowed in anguish, Ulfar bows down over the bodies encased in ceramite and adamantium.{/n} "Once again, fate has barred me from travelling to the hall of the Allfather with my brothers."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "My brothers." {n}Red brows furrowed in anguish, Ulfar bows down over the bodies encased in ceramite and adamantine.{/n} "Once again, fate has barred me from travelling to the hall of the Allfather with my brothers."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “我的兄弟们。”{n}乌尔法痛苦地皱起了红色的眉毛，对那些包裹在陶钢与精金中的尸体鞠了一躬。{/n}“命运再一次阻挠了我，让我无法与我的兄弟们团聚，前往全父的圣殿。”
languages.original_text: "My brothers." {n}Red brows furrowed in anguish, Ulfar bows down over the bodies encased in ceramite and adamantine.{/n} "Once again, fate has barred me from travelling to the hall of the Allfather with my brothers."

traits.locale_text: “我的兄弟们。”{n}乌尔法痛苦地皱起了红色的眉毛，对那些包裹在陶钢与精金中的尸体鞠了一躬。{/n}“命运再一次阻挠了我，让我无法与我的兄弟们团聚，前往全父的圣殿。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「同胞よ」{n}赤い眉が苦悶に歪み、ウルファーはセラマイトとアダマンチウムに包まれた遺体に頭を下げる。{/n}「全知の父と同胞が待つ間へ旅立つところが、またもや運命に邪魔されたな」
languages.original_text: "My brothers." {n}Red brows furrowed in anguish, Ulfar bows down over the bodies encased in ceramite and adamantine.{/n} "Once again, fate has barred me from travelling to the hall of the Allfather with my brothers."

traits.locale_text: 「同胞よ」{n}赤い眉が苦悶に歪み、ウルファーはセラマイトとアダマンチウムに包まれた遺体に頭を下げる。{/n}「全知の父と同胞が待つ間へ旅立つところが、またもや運命に邪魔されたな」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Mis hermanos». {n}Ulfar frunce el ceño, sacudiendo sus espesas cejas rojizas, y se inclina sobre los cadáveres envueltos en ceramita y adamantino.{/n} «Una vez más, el destino me ha prohibido acompañar a mis hermanos a los salones del Padre de todas las cosas».
languages.original_text: "My brothers." {n}Red brows furrowed in anguish, Ulfar bows down over the bodies encased in ceramite and adamantine.{/n} "Once again, fate has barred me from travelling to the hall of the Allfather with my brothers."

traits.locale_text: «Mis hermanos». {n}Ulfar frunce el ceño, sacudiendo sus espesas cejas rojizas, y se inclina sobre los cadáveres envueltos en ceramita y adamantio.{/n} «Una vez más, el destino me ha prohibido acompañar a mis hermanos a los salones del Padre de todas las cosas».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Mes frères... » {n}Fronçant de chagrin ses sourcils roux, Ulfar s'incline devant les corps pris dans la céramite et l'adamantine.{/n} « Une fois encore le destin m'a empêché de rejoindre les halls du Père de Tous aux côtés de mes frères. »
languages.original_text: "My brothers." {n}Red brows furrowed in anguish, Ulfar bows down over the bodies encased in ceramite and adamantine.{/n} "Once again, fate has barred me from travelling to the hall of the Allfather with my brothers."

traits.locale_text: « Mes frères... » {n}Fronçant de chagrin ses sourcils roux, Ulfar s'incline devant les corps pris dans la céramite et l'adamantium.{/n} « Une fois encore le destin m'a empêché de rejoindre les halls du Père de Tous aux côtés de mes frères. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Meine Brüder." {n}Schmerzerfüllt beugt Ulfar sich zu den Leichen hinunter, die in Ceramit und Adamant eingeschlossen sind.{/n} "Und wieder verhindert das Schicksal, dass ich mit meinen Brüdern zur Halle des Allvaters reise."
languages.original_text: "My brothers." {n}Red brows furrowed in anguish, Ulfar bows down over the bodies encased in ceramite and adamantine.{/n} "Once again, fate has barred me from travelling to the hall of the Allfather with my brothers."

traits.locale_text: "Meine Brüder." {n}Schmerzerfüllt beugt Ulfar sich zu den Leichen hinunter, die in Ceramit und Adamantium eingeschlossen sind.{/n} "Und wieder verhindert das Schicksal, dass ich mit meinen Brüdern zur Halle des Allvaters reise."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Kardeşlerim." {n}Acı içinde çattığı kızıl kaşlarıyla Ulfar, seramitle ve adamantiyumla kaplanmış bedenlerin üzerine eğiliyor.{/n} "Kader beni bir kez daha kardeşlerimle Yücebaba'nın salonuna varmaktan alıkoydu."
languages.original_text: "My brothers." {n}Red brows furrowed in anguish, Ulfar bows down over the bodies encased in ceramite and adamantine.{/n} "Once again, fate has barred me from travelling to the hall of the Allfather with my brothers."

traits.locale_text: "Kardeşlerim." {n}Acı içinde çattığı kızıl kaşlarıyla Ulfar, seramit ve adamantiyumla kaplanmış bedenlerin üzerine eğiliyor.{/n} "Kader beni bir kez daha Yücebaba'nın salonuna kardeşlerimle gitmekten alıkoydu."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
